alert.note: Alert for Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 20 at 2:45PM CDT until August 21 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF INLAND SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI FOR AN INCREASED WILDFIRE RISK... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR PERRY COUNTY... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 075. * WINDS...Southeast 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 40 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
